A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved the movie\, it has a few flaws as any movie does\, but it's one of the best movies I've seen! My husband and I already preordered it\, and we would gladly spend money to see it in theaters to get our fix while waiting for our copy on blue ray. \nI have been a huge start wars fan for over 20 years\, I grew up watching the older movies over and over with my brothers. Go see it with an open mind\, and don't listen to either side (it being good vs. It being bad) think for yourself??. It's work your time!
